```{r}

#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("data/i_names.csv")
x |>
  summarize(propMaleNames = sum(n[sex == "M"]), propFemaleNames = sum(n[sex == "F"]), .by = year) |>
  filter(year >= 1900)
```
